item.title: Ofcom investigates Elon Musk's X over Grok AI sexual deepfakes
item.description: The watchdog said it had received reports of the platform's Grok AI chatbot creating undressed images of people.

item.title: Former Tory chancellor Nadhim Zahawi defects to Reform UK
item.description: Zahawi was a Conservative MP and served as chancellor under Boris Johnson.

item.title: Cascarino earring a 'schoolgirl error' - Williams
item.description: Fara Williams says West Ham's Estelle Cascarino made a "schoolgirl error" by being denied a debut because she could not remove an earring.

item.title: Watch: Moment skier and dog swept along by avalanche
item.description: Footage recorded by Spanish skier Ares Masip shows the incident on Pic de l'Hortell, a mountain in Andorra.

item.title: He once criticised African leaders who cling to power. Now he wants a seventh term
item.description: Yoweri Museveni, 81, says he has brought stability to Uganda. His critics complain of political oppression.
